data.caption: Notice of Offer for Sale of Shares by Promoter & Floor Price
data.news_body:
Notice of the proposed offer for sale of equity shares of face value of Rs. 2 each ("Equity Shares") of Hindustan Zinc Limited (the "Company") by its promoter Vedanta Limited (the "Seller"/ "Promoter") through the stock exchange mechanism (the
"Notice").

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Issue of Securities
Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Committee Of Directors Held On Friday January 23 2026
data.news_body: In continuation to our letter No. HZL/2025-26/SECY/146 dated January 20 2026 and pursuant to the provisions of Regulations 30 and 51 of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations) we hereby inform that the duly authorized Committee of Directors at its meeting held today i.e. Friday January 23 2026 has considered and approved the issuance of unsecured redeemable rated listed non-convertible debentures (NCDs) aggregating up to ? 1400 Crore which NCDs are to be issued in following 2 (two) separately transferable and redeemable principal parts: (i) ? 420 Crore (STRPP 1); and (ii) ? 980 Crore (STRPP 2 " together with STRPP 1 STRPPS) where the cumulative principal amount of the STRPPS shall not exceed ? 1400 Crore.

Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: This is further to our letters dated April 21, 2023, the Company had hosted an earnings conference call with investors and analyst on Friday, April 21, 2023 to discuss the financial performance of the Company for the Fourth Quarter and Year Ended March 31, 2023.Please find attached the transcript of the earnings call. The same is also made available on the Company's website at https://www.hzlindia.com/investors/reports-press-releases/.

data.caption: Audio Recordings Of Earnings Call For The Fourth Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 read with clause 15 of Para A of Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby confirm that we have uploaded audio recording of the Fourth Quarter and Year Ended March 31, 2023 Earnings Call held on April 21, 2023, on our Company's website under tab Investors > Reports & Press releases https://www.hzlindia.com/investors/reports-press-releases/.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: In continuation to our letter of even number dated April 21, 2023, Investors presentation issued on the Audited Financial Results for the Fourth quarter and year ended March 31, 2023 is attached herewith.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For March 31, 2023
data.news_body: As per the requirement of Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015, ('Listing Regulations') the Board of Directors of the Company have considered and approved the Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the FourthQuarter and Year ended March 31, 2023.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of The Board Of Directors Of Hindustan Zinc Limited ('Company') Held On April 21, 2023
data.news_body:
As per the requirement of Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation, 2015, ('Listing Regulations') the Board of Directors of the Company have considered and approved the Audited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the Fourth Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023.

Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) regulation 2015 listing agreement, we wish to inform that the Board on the recommendation of Nomination & Remuneration Committee and Audit & Risk Management Committee, had approved appointment of Mr. Sandeep Modi currently Interim CFO, as Chief Financial Officer (KMP) of the Company w.e.f. April 21, 2023.
